Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Strip of wood
Description: Irregular-shaped flat strip of wood with a width of 2,5 cm and 2,4 cm at either ends and a maximum width of 3,5 cm. The object was obviously trimmed and it has the look of a repetitive wave. One of the extremities is straight whereas the other is rounded and bears burnt marks on one surface. The function is far from evident.
